<!-- docs:child of bal-navbar -->

# Navbar Brand

`bal-navbar-brand` is a child component of `bal-navbar` that defines the area in the navbar where the logo or the title of the applications is.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description               | Type                  | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------- | --------------------- | ----------- |
| `href`   | `href`    | Link of the logo / title. | `string \| undefined` | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event         | Description                               | Type                      |
| ------------- | ----------------------------------------- | ------------------------- |
| `balNavigate` | Emitted when the link element has clicked | `CustomEvent<MouseEvent>` |
